================================
# Government Tender Announcement 

### Tender Title
NPP20230814 Calibrated Loop Antenna Kit

### Reference Number 
cb-7651-41894993

### Solicitation Number 
NPP20230814

### Tender Receipt Details

*   **Public Publication Date:** 28 July 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 14 August 2023 - 2:00 pm (Eastern Daylight Time)

### Tender Details

*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal against Supply Arrangement
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 28 August 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 29 March 2024

### Tender Requirements

The Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) is inviting interested suppliers to submit a request for proposal (RFP) for the procurement of calibrated loop antenna kits. 

The RFP is issued against the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-16ELEC (category 4.13 RF/M components), and all terms and conditions of the SA apply.

The contractor is requested to submit a bid for all items listed in Annex A. Equivalents of the specified items will also be considered, provided the manufacturer is on the supply arrangement.

### Tender Evaluation

Bids will be evaluated in accordance with the terms and conditions of the SA. The evaluation will be based on the following criteria:

*   Technical compliance with the requirements presented in the RFP and in Annex A
*   Compliance with equivalent products offered by the contractor (as per Equivalent Products, B3000T)

The total evaluated bid price will be the sum of all items listed in Annex A. The bidder must provide prices in Canadian dollars, with freight charges included. Goods and Services Tax (GST) and/or Harmonized Sales Tax (HST) are not included for evaluation purposes.

### Tender Special Instructions

The following conditions are applicable:

*   Integrity Provisions - Declaration of Convicted Offences (terms and conditions of the SA)
*   Standard Instructions, Clauses and Conditions (terms and conditions of the SA)
*   Basis of Payment: Satisfactory completion of all obligations under the contract
